previewArticle.title: New England Revolution vs. Columbus Crew | MLS Cup Playoffs Match Preview

recapArticle.title: New England Revolution 3, Columbus Crew 1 | MLS Cup Playoffs Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: The Columbus Crew look to finish off the Columbus Crew in the second leg of their Eastern Conference Semifinal matchup.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: New England Revolution vs. Columbus Crew | November 9, 2014

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Kelyn Rowe's strong shot goes just wide

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Attempt missed. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Chris Tierney.

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: s10'- Crew find patches of space and move the ball down the right, but the cross into the box is at Shuttleworth to end the threat #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: Brad Baker
timelineItems.text: #NERevs finally draw a “good” crowd, and it still looks empty. Giant, cavernous NFL stadiums are not proper soccer venues. Obvious.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Ethan Finlay (Columbus Crew).
Chris Tierney (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: Meram looking sharp so far. Tchani needs to get it together. #NEvCLB #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: Inside MLS
timelineItems.text: 12' 0-0 (NE 4-2): Open fare as expected in the early stages. Lots of space in midfield. #NEvCLB #MLS

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: Best non-MLS Cup #NERevs home playoff attendance was 18,118 in 05 v Fire for EC Championship. Tonight may beat it: http://t.co/oIR7ud44jA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Héctor Jiménez (Columbus Crew).
Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Tony Tchani (Columbus Crew).
Charlie Davies (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Anders Aarhus
timelineItems.text: I'll say this - eye test/intuition says Columbus has a better chance than DC had yesterday. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 13'- Arrieta already with his second foul of the game as he tugs Rowe's jersey fighting for the ball #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: Ryan Schwepfinger
timelineItems.text: Eric Gehrig far and away the #Crew96 leader in touches so far. 19 for Gehrig, 12 for the next-closest (Parkhurst). #ForColumbus

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Héctor Jiménez (Columbus Crew) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Eric Gehrig with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 15': Jimenez heads a cross from Gehrig, but Hector's header goes high over the crossbar.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Columbus Crew. Waylon Francis tries a through ball, but Jairo Arrieta is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: TNC MLS
timelineItems.text: 15' CHANCE: Good look for Jimenez off a cross but his header is high and wide. Crew looking far more likely. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: lala lalala
timelineItems.text: JJ just took off his snood. He means business now. #NEvCLB #REVS

timelineItems.name: Deadlock Victim ✡
timelineItems.text: Have we heard "We all laugh at a yellow football team" from the Fort yet? #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Teal Bunbury (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Scott Caldwell.

timelineItems.name: Nick Chávez
timelineItems.text: Patriots have a by week? #MLS and #NERevs finally with a bit of luck. Stadium (lower level) looks good filled. Imagine in downtown Boston.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Justin Meram (Columbus Crew) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is too high. Assisted by Tony Tchani.

timelineItems.name: Julian Cardillo
timelineItems.text: Kevin Alston needs to be a bit more direct when he goes forward. Nice work to join in the attack, but nothing to show for it! #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 19': Bunbury tracks down a pass and races into the 18. His shot at Steve Clark is saved and Clark pounces on the rebound.

timelineItems.name: Inside MLS
timelineItems.text: 19' 0-0 (NE 4-2): Clark stops Bunbury's shot at the near post. Sharp angle. Clark had it covered all the way. #NEvCLB #MLS

timelineItems.name: Tempo
timelineItems.text: Plenty of actions so, but no score at @GilletteStadium after 20 minutes as the #NERevs are looking to get back to the conference finals.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Justin Meram (Columbus Crew) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right following a corner.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Justin Meram's shot goes wide to the right

timelineItems.desc: Bobby Shuttleworth slides in to make a crucial stop.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Bobby Shuttleworth slides in to stop the Crew's chance

timelineItems.name: TNC MLS
timelineItems.text: 20' Immediately down the other end, Meram has a chance but blazes over from a tight angle on the left. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, New England Revolution 3, Columbus Crew 1.

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: . @NERevolution mete miedo y aplasta por 7-3 en el marcador global al Crew: http://t.co/jEvTWvFwpx #NEvCLB http://t.co/aLVBcxNy7S

timelineItems.desc: The New England Revolution advance to the Eastern Conference Championship after a 7-3 aggregate win over the Columbus Crew.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: New England Revolution vs. Columbus Crew | November 9, 2014

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 21': The double-team of Francis and Trapp helps dump the Kevin Alston attack out of the box.

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: I know they need goals, by this thing is far too open and disorganized for #Crew96 early on. That's not how they'll make up the deficit.

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: #Crew96 with 65% possession so far. Outshooting #NERevs 4 to 1. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Ethan Finlay (Columbus Crew) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: In other news: Wil Trapp is wearing all black boots rather than his usual Predators. A nod to Higuain?

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 21': Arrieta chased down a ball in the box as Shuttleworth races to try to snag the loose ball. Last touched by Arrieta. #NERevs goal kick.

timelineItems.name: John Bava III
timelineItems.text: Columbus is doing a great job creating chances so far, it just comes down to finishing said chances. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Cathal Conlon
timelineItems.text: Here's the midnightriders tifo and the packed fort. Awesome energy tonight. #nerevs #STAND http://t.co/wJ3Lpgmm2Y

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: If you aren't sure which #NERevs player was involved in a certain play, it's probably Lee Nguyen. Guy is everywhere.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Dun na. Dun na. Dunananananna #NERevs #STAND (via @NESoccerToday) http://t.co/m2ED1zmZpq

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Columbus Crew. Conceded by José Gonçalves.
Foul by Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution).
Wil Trapp (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Matt Bernhardt
timelineItems.text: #Crew96 just tuned in at the fourth minute - rather surprised to see Jimenez in the central midfield. Anyone else?

timelineItems.desc: Teal Bunbury's shot is saved by Steve Clark.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Steve Clark makes a stop on Teal Bunbury's shot

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: Justin Meram has been dropping much deeper and more central with Hector Jimenez pushing forward more without Higuain. #crew96

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 26': Tyson Wahl clears a loose ball on the run that was being tracked by Jermaine Jones on the counter.

timelineItems.name: Inside MLS
timelineItems.text: 25' 0-0 (NE 4-2): Wahl over well to cut out a Rowe through ball toward Jones. Not a lot of action at the sharp end for either side. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: TNC MLS
timelineItems.text: 26' Searching ball forward towards Jones but Tyson Wahl cleans up nicely. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.

timelineItems.name: Total MLS
timelineItems.text: Just turned #NEvCLB on. 1) Fans at Gillette looks awesome. 2) @mbretosESPN!

timelineItems.name: Inside MLS
timelineItems.text: 29' 0-0 (NE 4-2): Clark collects a Rowe effort from distance. #NEvCLB #MLS

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 28'- Clark turns the ball over to Rowe outside the box. Rowe shoots quick, but Clark gets back in position for the save #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: MassiveCity
timelineItems.text: I was thinking #Crew96 needed a goal by the 30th minute. Breaking the match up into 3rds, and all. We're getting close. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: ⚽️Jensen Alvarado⚽️
timelineItems.text: Everybody in for support tonight for our #NERevs MAKE A #STAND #EasternConferenceSemis

timelineItems.name: TNC MLS
timelineItems.text: 3' Columbus push forward down the right and earn a corner. Jimenez will take. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Justin Meram (Columbus Crew) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right.
Corner,  Columbus Crew. Conceded by José Gonçalves.

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 29': Clark tried to  clear a pass and Rowe intercepted it, took a quick shot but Clark saved it.

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 29' #NERevs 0 (4) #Crew96 0 (2) High pressure on Clark leads to @Krowe210 firing from distance, but Crew 'keeper recovers to make the save.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution).
Wil Trapp (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Greg Benson
timelineItems.text: Jermaine Jones' dive looked like my last attempt at roller skating. Difference being I actually hurt myself. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Héctor Jiménez (Columbus Crew).
Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Tchani was one of my favorite players to watch this year. But he's been a hot mess for the last 120 minutes. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Tchani has had a rough day so far. He's been indecisive too often in the first half hour of this one. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 32': Meram's seeing-eye pass almost reaches Arrieta on the break but Shuttleworth steps-up and scoops-up the pass.

timelineItems.name: Inside MLS
timelineItems.text: 31' 0-0 (NE 4-2): Revs compact and organized inside their defensive third. Lots of numbers in the right areas. Crew stymied. #NEvCLB #MLS

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Jairo Arrieta (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from the center of the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Jairo Arrieta's strike isn't enough to beat Bobby Shuttleworth

timelineItems.name: Ryan Schwepfinger
timelineItems.text: The #NERevs are really packing the house when #Crew96 gets close to goal. Everyone collapsing inward.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Jairo Arrieta (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Eric Gehrig with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Michelle
timelineItems.text: These refs are wearing yellow under their green shirts #theysuck #callafouldipshit #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 34': CHANCE - Gehrig with a cross that falls to Arrieta's right foot, but Shuttleworth stones Jairo on the doorstep. #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Teal Bunbury (New England Revolution).
Eric Gehrig (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Cathal Conlon
timelineItems.text: KEEPAH! Big save @b_shuttle #NERevs #STAND

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: If Arrieta places that it's a goal. No need to go for power there. #NEvCLB #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: Inside MLS
timelineItems.text: 34' 0-0 (NE 4-2): SAVE: Shuttleworth down well to block from Arrieta. Best chance of the evening so far. #NEvCLB #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Justin Meram (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Waylon Francis with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: So big Mr. Shuttleworth. #NEvCLB #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: If Arrieta's not gonna bury that, then @ColumbusCrew aren't even going to make this interesting. That was a gift. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Last year it was Reis with the big saves. This year Shuttleworth steps up #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Steve Clark makes a confident stop on Kelyn Rowe's strike

timelineItems.name: Renny Swan
timelineItems.text: #NERevs risking too much for me to feel comfortable. Not nervous mostly because we look much more dangerous in attack. Gotta punish them.

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 36'- Steve Clark didn't realize how close Lee Nguyen was and almost turned the ball over in his 6-yard box. Top-tapped it to safety #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: Patrick Murphy
timelineItems.text: This is the point of the match I was worried about. #Crew96 have started pushing forward and now #NERevs can hit on the counter.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: #NEvCLB kicking off! Tune in now to ESPN2 or ESPN Deportes. http://t.co/cceEIZxB60 http://t.co/CnEtv66kB4

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Tony Tchani (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Tony Tchani's strike is stopped by Bobby Shuttleworth

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Justin Meram (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from long range on the left is blocked. Assisted by Waylon Francis.

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 42'- GOAL Lee Nguyen #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: Inside MLS
timelineItems.text: GOAL: New England 1 (Nguyen, 43') - Columbus 0 #NEvCLB #MLS

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Ball into the stands as Nguyen grabs another clutch goal #nerevs

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: The Revs pinged the ball all around the #crew96 area before Lee Nguyen netted his 19th goal.

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: GOALLL!!! #MVLee extends the #NERevs aggregate lead!! http://t.co/ejrLPEE95K

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: The Res speed upfront has been the difference in this series. Bunbury and Davies making things happen, Bunbury made that Nguyen goal #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Craig Forde
timelineItems.text: Nguyen's second of the playoffs, 20th total on the year, and #NERevs now take a 5-2 lead in the aggregate. Will take a #Crew96 miracle here

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Charlie Davies (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Charlie Davies shot is deflected away by Steve Clark

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 43': Bunbury's cross to the center of the area was tapped in by Nguyen after Clark palmed the ball away from Teal earlier in the sequence.

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Great goal by Nguyen but also recognize the contributions of Bunbury. Had only recently moved to that side of the field #NERevs

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: Bunbury chips the ball over a wall of Crew defenders and Lee was unmarked cutting into the box. Crew now need 4 goals #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: Nicholas Murray
timelineItems.text: Nguynner, Nguynner, Eastern Conference Final Dinner. #NEvCLB #MLSPlayoffs #MVLee

timelineItems.name: Brooke Tunstall
timelineItems.text: #MVLee sloppy defense by tje Crew but nice hustle by Teal Banbury and Charlie Davies to create the chance for Nguyen. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Charlie Davies (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Kelyn Rowe.
Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Steve Clark.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Jairo Arrieta (Columbus Crew) header from the center of the box is saved in the top center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Bobby Shuttleworth comes up with a huge save before the half

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Jairo Arrieta (Columbus Crew) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Justin Meram with a cross.
Corner,  Columbus Crew. Conceded by Bobby Shuttleworth.

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: HALFTIME - #NERevs lead 1-0 in this match and 5-2 on aggregate. #Crew96 needs four in the second half to advance.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Oh, snap, Shuttleworth. #NEvCLB #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, New England Revolution 1, Columbus Crew 0.
Attempt missed. Michael Parkhurst (Columbus Crew) header from the centre of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Héctor Jiménez with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: #Crew96 had their chances in the first half, but Lee Nguyen's goal and Shuttleworth's saves have #NERevs up 1-0 (5-2 on aggregate) at HT.

timelineItems.name: Deep in the Fort
timelineItems.text: I came into this series thinking Clark was the better keeper. Boy was I wrong. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: NE Soccer Journal
timelineItems.text: HT: #NERevs 1-0 #Crew96. Revs lead, 5-2, on aggregate. Nguyen’s goal and Shuttleworth’s big saves increase Revs' stranglehold on series.

timelineItems.name: KICKTV
timelineItems.text: That is the dagger. #NERevs #MVLee #MLSPlayoffs http://t.co/p2u7j0vMPE

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New England Revolution 1, Columbus Crew 0. Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Lee Nguyen gives the Revolution a lead before the half

timelineItems.name: Conor Frederick
timelineItems.text: Jaws just sank the Crew. #NERevs #STAND http://t.co/MgvBCz0bAX

timelineItems.name: Bill Midd
timelineItems.text: No Higuain = No Party. Still a good #MLS season for #Crew96. Better luck in 2015 #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Con el gol de Lee Nguyen, @ColumbusCrew necesita anotar cuatro y no recibir más: http://t.co/vKvNmceQPw #NEvCLB http://t.co/4ldlx9aNK3

timelineItems.name: NE Soccer Journal
timelineItems.text: That’s Lee Nguyen’s second career playoff goal, and his 19th total goal this season. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: DC Revs Fan
timelineItems.text: 45 minutes to go. No stupid cards in 2nd half please. #NERevs #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: Robert Guerin
timelineItems.text: That's #Crew96 done. Good season cut short. #NERevs v #NYRB should be fireworks. Winner still unfancied vs West winner. #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: Paul Garlock
timelineItems.text: @thesoccerdon good call at bringing @Jermainejunior to #MLS.. really making league look good by being on the ground 80% of the time #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: Dracula
timelineItems.text: Hey Klinsy! Call this dude up---------------->>>> @LeeNguyen24. What's that oh... See y'all, he listens to us. #NERevs #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Rosco
timelineItems.text: @KICKTV Just goes to show. #Crew96 be on top this half but failed to take chances,you give this guy a chance and he'll take it! #NEvCLB #MLS

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: Lee Nguyen now has 20 goals on the season. (18 #MLS regular season + 2 playoffs) #NERevs #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: Nick Chávez
timelineItems.text: Since NERevs v. RBNY seem a shoe-in now, I think #NERevs advance to final w/ the form they're in, though #RBNY have been strong. That said..

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Replay of the Shuttleworth savve on the Arrieta header just showed on the jumbo, still an unreal save. Great position by Bobby #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Steve Sirk
timelineItems.text: Realistically, it's proven the #Crew96 can score three away goals in four minutes and 22 seconds. They'll need one more in the other 40:38.

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins New England Revolution 1, Columbus Crew 0.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Steve Clark (Columbus Crew) makes a big save on Lee Nguyen's (New England Revolution) shot.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Steve Clark makes a great save on Lee Nguyen's strike

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: .@LeeNguyen24 is a goal-scoring machine. Watch --> http://t.co/8F6tgajILD #NEvCLB #MLSPlayoffs http://t.co/vmZV1i7aVO

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: One halftime substition for the Crew with forward Adam Bedell replacing defender Tyson Wahl. #NERevs

timelineItems.text: 46' NE 1-0 (CLB 5-2): The second half has started. Crew must summon the strength of Chris Roner to stage revival here. #NEvCLB #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Teal Bunbury (New England Revolution) header from the right side of the six yard box misses to the left. Assisted by Kevin Alston with a cross.

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 47' #NERevs 1 (5) #Crew96 0 (2) Two BIG chances for the Revs out of the gate. @LeeNguyen24's shot saved before @TealBunB fires wide.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top center of the goal.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Teal Bunbury (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left.

timelineItems.name: Total MLS
timelineItems.text: Bunbury just missed the entire goal from 9 yards out then headed a shot from the six out for a throw in.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Charlie Davies.

timelineItems.name: Brooke Tunstall
timelineItems.text: Pretty much sums up Teal Bumbury right there - looks good and promising but not all there. #NEvCLB #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Tony Tchani (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Héctor Jiménez.
Attempt saved. Tony Tchani (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Now the Crew get one n ShuttleworthTchani making the great run and strong effort #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the center of the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Kelyn Rowe's shot is saved by a diving Steve Clark

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: Inside MLS
timelineItems.text: 50' NE 1-0 (NE 5-2): Clark down well at the near post to deny Rowe snapshot. #NEvCLB #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Scott Caldwell.
Corner,  Columbus Crew. Conceded by Kevin Alston.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Mr. Steve Clark keeping the @ColumbusCrew in this one. #NEvCLB #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: Little MLS Blog
timelineItems.text: As I always like to say, the best defense in MLS is a good offense. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Columbus Crew. Conceded by José Gonçalves.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New England Revolution 2, Columbus Crew 0. Jose Goncalves (New England Revolution) left footed shot from the center of the box.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Jose Goncalves scores from close range

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Adam Bedell (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Héctor Jiménez.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: José Gonçalves makes it two for @NERevolution on the night. #NERevs now up 6-2 on aggregate. #NEvCLB #MLSPlayoffs http://t.co/6o3UDsafl8

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Justin Meram (Columbus Crew).
Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.desc: MLSsoccer.com's Nick Firchau and Armchair Analyst Matt Doyle take a look at Columbus Crew Goalkeeper Steve Clark and his impact on this team in 2014.
timelineItems.title: How important has Steve Clark been to the Columbus Crew in 2014? | 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs presented by AT&T

timelineItems.name: Carl Setterlund
timelineItems.text: Jose Goncalves ventures forward, somehow scores. Yeesh. Don't hurt em, #NERevs. It's now 6-2 on aggregate an hour into 2nd leg #NEvCLB.

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: Now 2-0 on the night and 6-2 on aggregate to the #NERevs. Crew needs four just to push this to extra time. #STAND

timelineItems.name: MLS GB
timelineItems.text: Meanwhile, Bobby Shuttleworth is continuing to save everything that comes near him. New England 6-2 Columbus on aggregate. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: KICKTV
timelineItems.text: Yeah, I think it's safe to say it's over. #NERevs #Crew96 #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Ethan Finlay (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is saved in the centre of the goal.

timelineItems.name: Mike Jackson
timelineItems.text: That could well be my second favourite #NERevs goal ever after Parkhurst! What a run by @Oneswitz

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: Ethan Finlay gets in alone on Shuttleworth and crosses. It falls harmlessly between two teammates. That kind of performance. #crew96

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Josh Williams (Columbus Crew) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Adam Bedell.

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: In the meantime, @b_shuttle has made two more huge saves. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Eric
timelineItems.text: #Crew96 coming out strong in the opening minutes.

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 5'- Tony Tchani gets into the box and shoots. Shot blocked, but Tchani collects the ball & shoots again, but right at Shuttleworth #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: TNC MLS
timelineItems.text: 5' The Crew with a string of very good passes and Meram finds Tchani in the area but his shot is right at Shuttleworth. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 5' #NERevs 0 (4) #Crew96 0 (2) Some early work for @b_shuttle, who's well positioned to gobble up a low shot from Tony Tchani from in close.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Ethan Finlay (Columbus Crew).
Bobby Shuttleworth (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 58' - #Crew96 sub: Josh Williams for Eric Gehrig. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Bobby Shuttleworth (New England Revolution) because of an injury.

timelineItems.desc: Ethan Finlay (Columbus Crew) is shown the red card.
timelineItems.title: RED CARD: Ethan Finlay is sent off for a challenge on Bobby Shuttleworth

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Jake Catanese
timelineItems.text: I'm not sure that's a red...it's late but hardly dangerous. Refs have been two hours late in controlling this series. #NERevs #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: NE Soccer Journal
timelineItems.text: 61’: Straight red card on #Crew96 Ethan Finlay for his knock to Shuttleworth’s head.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Sherman
timelineItems.text: Villarreal is not a good referee. Looks like he went from no call to a red card based purely on reactions and not what he saw. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: The fact that Shuttleworth is still in the game is terrible to me. He was out on the field. Should not stay on the field IMO #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Little MLS Blog
timelineItems.text: A nonsensical red card puts the final nail in Columbus’ coffin. The Crew is dead, long live Crew SC. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: Patrick Murphy
timelineItems.text: That card like doesn't come out if #NERevs don't assault Finlay like that.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Karell
timelineItems.text: Wow! Goes from bad to worse for #Crew96 as Ethan Finlay is shown a straight red card for a collision with Shuttleworth. Very harsh.

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: José Gonçalves le robó la esperanza, le apagó la luz y le clavó un puñal a Columbus: http://t.co/y9wvFyuPy9 #NEvCLB http://t.co/QfIxS0NxF5

timelineItems.name: MLS Atheist
timelineItems.text: Good thing this series is over because if that red card actually had an impact on the result, things would not be pretty. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: @mattgoshert there was definitely contact. But it was accidental.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Justin Meram (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Adam Bedell.

timelineItems.name: Todd Fichtenberg
timelineItems.text: We were literally 10 feet from action. IF there was contact it was incidental, BIG IF. NO REPLAY at Gillette is pretty damning, #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Jason St. Jacques
timelineItems.text: Would not call that a just ejection, but it's been a good fight by Columbus. Time for our #NERevs to tackle the bigger challenge #Finals2014

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Head injury or not, Shuttleworth comes up with a really good save on that shot #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Justin Meram (Columbus Crew) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Justin Meram goes into the book for a rough tackle

timelineItems.name: Rundy
timelineItems.text: Game is all but over but Ref really blew it with that Red card, shame. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.comment: Kevin Alston (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Justin Meram (Columbus Crew).

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Can't imagine Ethan Finlay will miss next year's season opener. That's an easy appeal.

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 66': CAUTION: Justin Meram is issued a yellow card after a foul on Kevin Alston.

timelineItems.name: kelsey ahmed
timelineItems.text: So much security #NERevs http://t.co/CLg4R3Ta8t

timelineItems.name: James Perry
timelineItems.text: Little know fact, Ethan Finley doubles as a bus driver so he had to start the bus, hence the Red Card #Nerevs #Stand #Nerevsgame

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New England Revolution 2, Columbus Crew 1. Tony Tchani (Columbus Crew) header from the center of the box to the top right corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Tony Tchani cuts into the lead with his header

timelineItems.comment: Justin Meram (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jermaine Jones (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: GOAL - Columbus pulls one back in the 69th min. Tchani with a header. #NERevs now lead 2-1 on the night, 6-3 on aggregate.

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Unfair for Bobby not to get a shutout tonight #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Jacque Lepard
timelineItems.text: AND THAT'S 1! Get it boyssss #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: And Tony Tchani scores his first goal of the season after one of his most difficult performances. Good on him to keep fighting.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: What do #crew96 need to do to win? @Ddwyer's answer: http://t.co/1sciw2dx9V #MLSPlayoffs #NEvCLB

timelineItems.comment: Kevin Alston (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jairo Arrieta (Columbus Crew).
Delay in match Michael Parkhurst (Columbus Crew) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Deadlock Victim ✡
timelineItems.text: Nice meaningless goal, #Crew96. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Josh Williams.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: #Crew96 get one back. Tony Tchani with the great header off the free kick. #NEvCLB #MLSPlayoffs http://t.co/NAmJxo0jjk

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Clifford Beshers
timelineItems.text: Look for a huge Columbus comeback. Down by four and down a man, the most dangerous score in soccer. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: Megan Myers
timelineItems.text: I kind of want Columbus to get it together because it would be a come back that NO ONE would EVER stop talking about. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Waylon Francis (Columbus Crew) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Wil Trapp.
Attempt missed. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right following a corner.
Hand ball by Wil Trapp (Columbus Crew).
Offside, New England Revolution. Kelyn Rowe tries a through ball, but Lee Nguyen is caught offside.
Héctor Jiménez (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Teal Bunbury (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Three subs for #Crew96. None so far the #NERevs. A bit surprising

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Columbus Crew. Ben Speas tries a through ball, but Josh Williams is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Teshawn Edmonds
timelineItems.text: Attendance at @GilletteStadium: 20,184 (perr @SoccerByIves & @InsideMLS) #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: gillettestadium
timelineItems.text: #STAND #nerevs

timelineItems.name: NE Soccer Journal
timelineItems.text: #NERevs playoff attendance record does not include 2002 MLS Cup game, which technically was a neutral-site game.

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: Last sub for the Crew: Arrieta off for Ben Speas #NEvCLB

timelineItems.comment: Scott Caldwell (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Adam Bedell (Columbus Crew).

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New England Revolution 3, Columbus Crew 1. Teal Bunbury (New England Revolution) left footed shot from the left side of the box.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Teal Bunbury seals the win for the Revolution

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 75': Substitution for the #NERevs as Daigo Kobayashi replaces Lee Nguyen. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: MassiveCity
timelineItems.text: "Most ridiculous Crew red card since Jair Marrufo tossed Gino Padula in exchange for a Blanco jersey." - (name withheld) #NEvCLB #MLS

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: The @GilletteStadium crowd salutes #MVLee on another job well done. https://t.co/x9BtTY8kkK

timelineItems.desc:
Katie Whitam, Jason Saghini and the coach Jesse Marsch break down the Eastern Conference Semifinal Leg 2 clash between the New England Revolution and the Columbus Crew.

Which team will win this match? PLAY MLS CUP PICK'EM: http://bracket.mlssoccer.com/picks

For more coverage of the 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs, presented by AT&T visit: http://www.mlssoccer.com/mlscup/2014
timelineItems.title: New England Revolution vs. Columbus Crew Leg 2 Preview | 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs presented by AT&T

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Teal Bunbury just kissed the #NERevs crest after scoring a goal. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: Fantastic ball from Daigo - just onto the field - and @TealBunB blasts it high to the near post. #NERevs lead 7-3 on aggregate!

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Goncalves goes off for Dorman and Jermaine Jones moves to middle back for the first time as a member of the #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Teal Bunbury. The through ball... finished with authority. #NEvCLB #MLSPlayoffs http://t.co/cCM0RHU3dN

timelineItems.name: Goal USA
timelineItems.text: GOAL! Bunbury slips behind the back line and fires past Clark. Revolution up 3-1 (7-3 on aggregate). #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: Daniel Pacini
timelineItems.text: Top shelf Bunbury!!! Bring on the Red Bull!!! Go #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Brian
timelineItems.text: The funny thing about Gillette Stadium is I bet if you asked the #Patriots players, they'd prefer to play on grass. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: What do #crew96 need to do to win? @Ddwyer14's answer: http://t.co/uQXyOlFZ6c #MLSPlayoffs #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: And in the aftermath, @Oneswitz comes off, replaced on the @SearsAuto substitution by Andy Dorman. Goncalves was on YC watch. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Brandon F
timelineItems.text: GOAL!!!!! @TealBunB makes it 4-1 @NERevolution with about 11 mins left! #STAND #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Ethan Wilber
timelineItems.text: #nerevs

timelineItems.name: Aaron Cranford
timelineItems.text: #NERevs playoff goals: 7 Second highest @MLS team (@NewYorkRedBulls ): 5 The next match looks exciting. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Scott Caldwell (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: KICKTV
timelineItems.text: Nearing kickoff between the @nerevolution & the #Columbus Crew! Spot in the Conference Finals against the @newyorkredbulls on the line! Who ya got moving on? #NERevs #Crew @mls

timelineItems.name: **Rob**
timelineItems.text: So the #Crew96 just need to win and score at least 5 goals, right? Seems simple enough.

timelineItems.name: Peter Fox
timelineItems.text: #mls #mlsplayoffs #revloution #nerevs

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 82' #NERevs 3 (7) #Crew96 1 (3) Final @SearsAuto substitution for the Revs as @Jermainejunior is replaced by @D_Barnes25. Eight mins left.

timelineItems.name: ExtraTime Radio
timelineItems.text: Teal has plenty to dance about right now #NERevs #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: Twiggster
timelineItems.text: 7-3 to the revs ...with 10 mins to go. A walk in the park! #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Massive Report
timelineItems.text: 82' Jones subbed off by #NERevs.

timelineItems.name: Rob McNicholas
timelineItems.text: Time to support #NERevs in #FortressFoxboro! Loud and proud! #MLSPlayoffs mls @kicktv @nerevolution http://t.co/OZhxf1uGJ6

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 4 - Columbus have scored three goals or more just four times in 36 previous @MLS playoff games (inc Finals). History. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: MLS Title Belt
timelineItems.text: .@ColumbusCrew needs to win by 3 if they want to advance in the #MLS playoffs, but only need to win by 1 for the #MLSTitleBelt. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: Crew 96
timelineItems.text: @MLSTitleBelt @NERevolution @ColumbusCrew "on the line" implies that there is any outcome apart from #Crew96 taking the Belt. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Confirmed Bob Kraft and @sunilgulati are in attendance. Oh boy #ussoccer #nerevs http://t.co/qkPlywmVEK

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: The @NHLBruins are in the house! http://t.co/J04T55fv9A

timelineItems.name: Kari Heistad
timelineItems.text: CD9 getting a big hug from Gulati as he leaves the field after warm ups. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Patrick Crowley
timelineItems.text: Wow! The @FortOfNE is full! #NERevs #stand http://t.co/vuc8rZrJDH

timelineItems.name: Andy Logsdon
timelineItems.text: Playoff soccer #NERevs http://t.co/8yYfpU6I7P

timelineItems.name: RIDeadHead
timelineItems.text: #NERevs #NETID #STAND #tmrp http://t.co/BIAIsEESGF

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: LAST CHANCE! Get those #Crew1st picks in before kickoff!

timelineItems.name: Cathal Conlon
timelineItems.text: A little different feeling in the air tonight. Can't beat playoff energy. #NERevs #STAND

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: Thanks for coming, #NorOnTour! Cheer loud #ForColumbus. #Crew96 http://t.co/zHYKh9pgRh

timelineItems.name: Mike Jackson
timelineItems.text: Feeling incredibly nervous for this game. 4-2 up and 4 away goals and yet I still feel some concern #NERevs

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: Team Tifo II. Thanks, @MidnightRiders and @NErebellion! http://t.co/s8t1ZlUCTF

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: Confirmed with #crew96 spokesman that Federico Higuain did not make the trip due to injury.

timelineItems.desc: Second yellow card to Justin Meram (Columbus Crew) for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: RED CARD: Justin Meram picks up his second yellow and is sent off

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Con ese gol de Teal Bunbury, ya se hace oficial. @NERevolution da miedo: http://t.co/G8tCQp6zcT #NEvCLB http://t.co/Z9bqDk7zI0

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Reminder: #Crew96 vs. #NERevs is on ESPN 2, even in Columbus.

timelineItems.name: Noses Malone
timelineItems.text: @cbrown4747 1) Don't lose by more than two 2) No cards 3) No injuries 4) Charlie Davies shimmy #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Hayden Bird
timelineItems.text: Farrell said to be out of the #NERevs lineup with a “right leg injury.” Nothing said beyond that.

timelineItems.name: Jordan Molnar
timelineItems.text: LETS GO CREW! YOU CAN FREAKING DO IT! Nobody else may believe, BUT WE DO! This wont be easy, but you guys can do it #ShockTheWorld #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Patrick Murphy
timelineItems.text: How diverse is Hector Jimenez? He played right back last week, now he's #Crew96's attacking mid.

timelineItems.name: Jake Catanese
timelineItems.text: #ESPN2 shows @MFparkhurst's midfield goal vs TFC as a member of the #NERevs before pregame interview. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: Tom Barr
timelineItems.text: No Higuain, Schoenfeld, or Anor in the 18. Higuain is likely done as a Crew player. #ForColumbus #Crew96

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: Goosebumps. http://t.co/OOGJM77D2n

timelineItems.name: New York City FC
timelineItems.text: One more spot to play for in the #MLSPlayoffs Eastern Conference finals. Watch #NEvCLB on @ESPN 2 now.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Home field advantage. #NERevs http://t.co/nXQmfE9hTn

timelineItems.name: Jonathan Tannenwald
timelineItems.text: I ask for something other than a scoreless draw in #NEvCLB. I'm on the record as to why.

timelineItems.name: Ben Hickey
timelineItems.text: Anthem done and #NEvCLB is almost underway. Intrigued to see how this pans out, #Crew96 need to score three if they're to have any chance.

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: Go time. #ForColumbus #Crew96 http://t.co/8oAK06IceQ

timelineItems.name: Cristobal R
timelineItems.text: Come on #Crew96 and do this. This fan's playoff beard is reaching Eddie Gaven territory. Extend its life! #MLS #TeamYes

timelineItems.comment: Kevin Alston (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Justin Meram (Columbus Crew).

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 85'- Meram clips Alston from behind and gets a yellow. His second and now the Crew are down to 9 men. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 85': Justin Meram is shown a second yellow card and is sent off. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: MassiveCity
timelineItems.text: What the hell! Jermaine Jones subbed off?! How is this match supposed to continue without a referee?! GARBER! THIZ IZ MADNEZZ! #MLS #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: TIME TO MAKE A #STAND! https://t.co/eilNQentIG

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Latest #nerevs tifo. http://t.co/RKfEYkDzdF

timelineItems.name: Derrick Blake
timelineItems.text: Lee Nguyen is my #MLS MVP. 18 goals, 9 game-winners. He's a huge part of the #NERevs revival. Can't wait to see him with the #USMNT.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Josh Williams.
Foul by Waylon Francis (Columbus Crew).
Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Drew Zuhosky
timelineItems.text: #NERevs aren't just content with eliminating #Crew96, but also burying them alive. #MLSplayoffs

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Darrius Barnes (New England Revolution).
Adam Bedell (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Jake Catanese
timelineItems.text: If Villareal has any decency, he ends this game at 90:00... #NERevs #NEvCLB #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 90': There will be three minutes of second-half stoppage time. #Crew96

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Charlie Davies (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Charlie Davies nearly scores in the final seconds

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Josh Williams.
Attempt saved. Charlie Davies (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Daigo Kobayashi.
Attempt missed. Andy Dorman (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is too high.
Offside, New England Revolution. Kelyn Rowe tries a through ball, but Teal Bunbury is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: @Craig_Forde Yup. NE one year ahead in the process and got a game-changer in Jones.

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: Tony Tchani drops to a knee with his head down as the final whistle is blown. #Crew96 players slinking back to their locker room.

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, New England Revolution 3, Columbus Crew 1.

timelineItems.name: Massive Report
timelineItems.text: 3-1 is your final from New England. #Crew96 out of playoffs after 7-3 aggregate series loss.

timelineItems.name: The REView
timelineItems.text: WERE IN THE EASTERN CONFERENCE FINAL BABY!!!!! #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: @NERevolution advance to the Eastern Conference Finals. #MLSPlayoffs #NEvCLB http://t.co/A1JBiXcgfA http://t.co/B0zA77EtEj
